Bryce Hudson (ubochí irí abụọ n'ọnwa Machị, 1979, Rabat, Morocco) bụ ónyé Moroccan-American Neo-plasticist (De Stijl) na-ese ihe
Ihe osise geometric mbụ nke Hudson na-enyocha agbụrụ na stereotypes site na ụdị geometric abstraction
Ka ógè na-aga n'ọrụ ya, n'ihi mmetụta nke echiche nke Constructivism, ihe osise na ihe ọkpụkpụ mgbidi na-ezo aka na ihe owuwu na oghere
Ihe osise ya jikọtara mmegharị na akụkọ ihe méré eme dịka Minimalism na Rococo.

Ya na ndị ọgbọ ya bụ Pierre Clerk na Ilya Bolotowsky, Hudson na-arụ ọrụ n'ime obéré ónyé na-ese ihe na-arụkọ ọrụ n'ụdị Neo-Plastic - na-agbasoghị iwu siri ike, kama na-enyocha omimi na ọdịnihu nke nkà geometric abstract.
A mụrụ Bryce Hudson na Rabat, Morocco ma kuchie ya n'ezinụlọ America dị ka nwa ọhụrụ
Ọ gụrụ ihe osise, nkà mmụta akparamàgwà mmadụ, na ihe ọkpụkpụ na Kent State University School of Fine Art
N'ihe ngosi 1999 na Speed Museum, ọ nyochara agbụrụ na mmetụta uche nkè agbụrụ na njirimara na ọha mmadụ nke ógè a.
